Personal Care Product Drives

Most homeless live without access to daily toiletries such as soap, shampoo, toothbrushes and feminine hygiene products. We provide these products to those in need.

Our Approach

Recruit Youth Leaders

Our youth leaders are passionate about changing the world.

Conduct Drives

Our youth leaders conduct personal care product drives at schools, churches and community centers.

Deliver and Track

Our youth leaders deliver the personal care products to their local homeless shelters, and we track the results.

15,740 Personal care products delivered
